Articles.Content: I know this isn't on the top of any developer's list, but I REALLY want the faring texture to be changed. The current stock model is really ugly and it really annoys me. A solid white would be nice, or prehaps you could even change the colors at will. What do you think?

I don't know about changing the colors, but a design change would be nice with solid white, but your flag could be put on it.

Edited March 11, 2017 by The Raging Sandwich

I like the idea of having multiple options for fairing color schemes. I would also like the option for multiple color schemes for fuel tanks, much like what the Color Coded Cannisters mod adds. I currently always play with that mod installed because it allows for vastly improved aesthetics.

I agree. You should have multiple textures that you can choose from. The current one is pretty ugly imo.

Fire
Simple white/grey texture would do just fine.
I agree a texture change shouldn't be too much trouble for squad's new band of merch making artists.
